threads.name: Harmony Hugs
threads.com:
Welcome to the official /mlp/ Secret Santa 2022 thread! Tell Santa all your wildest wishes and come join us in sending cards, gifts, and cheer to your fellow Pony lovers!
Sign-ups are closed and gift assignments are out. Card assignments are ongoing, Wooooooo!
CHECK IN TO THE THREAD. Make sure to check your emails and check into the thread so that your Santa knows that you’re alive and can ask you questions.

>How’s this thing work?
Read the FAQ!
The short form:
Gifts are given Round Robin Circle Jerk style (A gives to B gives to C who gives to A) while cards are exchanged traditionally (whomever you give a card to should send one back to you). You will be randomly assigned anons by email after the signups are over so please keep an eye out!

Latecomers: Kiwi is looking at opening the 2022 Latecomers on November the 23rd at 5pm CST! Signups will end on November the 30th at 11:59pm CST

Nov the past: Gift assignments out.
Nov the soon: Card assignments ongoing!
Dec 1st - 10th: The latest suggested mailing period. Consider mailing on the early side if you’re shipping internationally.

FAG here: https://fag.anonfilly.com/

Coordinator email for comments/concerns/general inquiries: MLPSecretSanta2022@gmail.com
Card Ambassador and milf mare connoisseur: thecardslut@gmail.com
Kiwi: Resident corpse, international correspondent, and expert in dealing with people who don't understand deadlines. kiwilatecomers@gmail.com

>WHERE’S MY SANTEE/SANTA?!
I’m so sorry, but they were eaten by a grue.
CHECK IN YOU GOOBERS!

>BUT IT’S NOT EVEN THANKSMAS YET! REEEEE!
Less than a week away! Do not wait! Start crafting and ordering so you can get those gifts out in time for Horsemas! Don’t be late! Panic! PAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANIC! And while you wait for the glue to dry or the parcels to arrive join us in thread and draw a cute OC, write a song, join a giveaway, chat about your holiday plans, and just spend some time with us here in the thread.This time of year might nominally be about the gifts, but for me, it’s always really been about spending some time with everyone. And, I dunno, friends but this, to me, feels like it’s going to be a vintage year for content. Keep it up, holy wow!

last_replies.com:
Lithia - #cookie

Now with image!
-----

After Lithia had been held down and given burns by her Slave-Master to teach her a lesson about obedience, she was told to stay outside for the rest of the day. Traumatized and alone, she spent a cold night sleeping in the garden shed and now awaits whatever the next day will bring.
-----

>The next day starts off very much like the previous day, with Grey coming outside, demanding you join him and Xena for breakfast.
>This time, however, he does so without a cup of hot tea, which you thought to have been an unusually nice but much appreciated gesture yesterday.
>You'd been almost willing to turn over a new leaf, until the horrific events that followed changed everything for the worse.
>Today, all niceties are gone, and the way he speaks with you clearly demands nothing short of immediate compliance, which, still feeling the bruises and burns on your body, you are only too happy to provide.
>You lost the mental strength to resist, at the same time as the bird on your cutie mark had been irrevocably disfigured, replacing in your mind the scorn of days prior with simple numbness.
>After a short breakfast, having been given a much smaller portion than Xena once again, Master reminds you of what he already told you yesterday.
>You are going to spend this day outside in the creaky shed again.
>Instead of feeling anger or resentment for being treated like a garden tool denied even the simple warmth of the house, you rotate the last remaining nourishment cube in your hoof, inspecting it from all sides, completely carefree, as if Master had just talked about a different mare.
>This is a rather accurate description of how you actually feel inside after yesterday's punishment—like a different mare.
>He hands you some rations—a plastic bag of cubes and a bottle of water—and sends you outside, but not before giving you a backhanded compliment about how you have seemingly turned into a much friendlier pony over night, going as far as stuffing a cookie between your lips as reward for it.
>You carry your supplies and the cookie over the lawn, which is still damp with morning dew, almost eager to get back into the familiar embrace of the darkness in the shed, which now feels like a welcoming respite from the cruel outside world.
>A peaceful place to lick your wounds while letting your mind go blank entirely undisturbed.
>Even the bone-chilling cold that your blanket has trouble protecting you from, does not detract from that.
>On the contrary, it numbs the nerves on your skin, easing the pain of the many bruises and burns more effectively than the cream you have been given ever could.
>Having reached the shed now, you stand as if rooted, your mind seemingly unwilling to open the door and get inside.
>The chocolaty goodness of the cookie still between your lips makes your mouth water as you try to collect yourself enough to go inside, not exactly knowing why you haven't done so already.

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>39343416
>For a long while you stand there, doing nothing but breathing in and out, releasing little clouds of breath from your nostrils into the cold autumn morning.
>Then, so suddenly that it even surprises yourself, you spit out the cookie into the grass and head inside without further hesitation.
>This... this certainly wasn't a rational decision, your stomach already yearning for the lost snack, which your tongue is still able to taste chocolate residue of.
>But... but it felt right!
>Inside the shed, the familiar odor of rubber and rust surrounds you as you lie down and pull your cold and slightly damp blanket over yourself.
>It takes some time for your body heat to warm everything up, but it eventually succeeds in creating a cozy island of warmth in the cold darkness.
>A new feeling of dread overcomes you, so suddenly in your heart that it almost drives you to the verge of tears.
>Why didn't you eat the damn cookie? You did everything correctly, being as polite and obedient to your Master as you could, earning his favor and a reward.
>Yet you rejected it, taking another unrequited step down the path that had led you to being horrifically mutilated just yesterday.
>Why can't you get this through your head? Why can't you change?!
>Are you stupid or something? Having trouble learning even the most basic lesson that countless other mares have learned before you?
>Maybe your thick skull needs a reminder!
>You put a hoof on your flank-burns and press down hard.
>Pain cuts through your entire body like a knife through butter, as the thin layer of protective material rips and droplets of fresh blood quill to the surface, staining your frog.
>Almost failing to suppress a scream, the pain succeeds in driving tears to your eyes, but self-hatred keeps you going.
"Give up. Give up! GIVE UP!"
"EAT THE DAMN COOKIE!"
>But you remain immobile, paralyzed by fear and anger and pain, while hot tears run down your exposed cheeks, dropping to the floor or getting caught up in the fur beneath your huge eyes.
>The realization that you haven't actually changed and that what had happened is sure to happen again is too much to bear.
>With trembling hoofs, you reach out into the darkness, grabbing the smooth pebble you picked up yesterday as a replacement for the stolen barret and place it under your tongue, where the familiar feeling provides comfort in this loneliest moment of your life.
>You can't tell exactly how long you remained like this, as time is a meaningless concept in the dark void surrounding you, but eventually you do calm down.
>Your tongue glides over the pebble, dispelling any illusion you might have had that it was more than just a piece of rock.
>You are truly alone... sucking on a pacifier like a little filly.
>A display of weakness that serves to amuse a part of you still filled with lingering self-hatred.
"Bah!"
>The salvia-covered pebble vanishes into the darkness of the shed as you spit it out in disgust.

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>39343422
>Moments of motionless, thoughtless existence go by while you stare into the darkness above you as if your companion could emerge from it at any moment to pull your ailing body into his warm embrace.
>You weren't aware that your small mare-heart was capable of missing someone so much.
>He was more than just a companion, giving you head pats and whispering nice words of freedom and happiness into your fluffy ears.
>It wasn't a lie when you told Grey that your mom gifted you that barret, which you later discovered to be so much more than what it looked like.
>Mom... it stings to think of her.
>Her name still carries a lot of regret.
>As an adult, you understand now what she must have been through trying to raise you and your siblings in such a hostile world.
>She had always tried her best, but you couldn't understand that back then, being a dumb, self-absorbed filly.
>As a puny slave, you own almost nothing, but you'd still give it all just to see her one more time.
>All you have left of her are slowly fading memories that your soggy brain desperately tries to cling to, but fails each day a little more.
>Closing your eyes, you try to picture all of them together, your younger sisters, your older sisters and Mom with her wings spread far, as if preparing to hug everyone in that little room that used to be your home.
----

I guess we are back to Friday's now, so much for trying to spread it out. Pretty proud of the image I drew. First time attempting that pose and I even like how to coloring turned out, despite only having my mouse to do it.
Also trying out a new writing style that uses longer sentences with more subclauses. Do you think it works better this way?

Howdy, partner!

What you see here began as a series of comedy-centric stories with the concept of an alicorn-ascended Princess Applejack trying to change a mismanaged Equestria for the better by humorously interacting with the other, quite lazy, princesses. Plus late night pink antics.

Not to mention a whole bunch of Changelings with nothing better to do but cause mischief.


The whole thing was set in motion by this gem:

~~~~~

>So, wait, why am Ah' a princess again?

>Because you seem to be the only goddamn one of those ponies who gets that a Princess need to do actual work regarding maintenance of the kingdom. You know how much city planning or trade negotiations Twilight or Luna have done? Fucking nothing. Everyone is obsessed with the world ending threats they think I should fight, but the minute I point out the free health care I have to work to maintain everyone goes quiet. And don't even get me started on Cadence, who can't even manage a basic meeting with the Equestrian Games representative. Fucking annoying. Go do actual princess stuff, because apparently everyone else got the pamphlets mixed up or something and thinks "Princess" means "Beat cop."

~~~~~

Are you feeling creative? Try your hand at writing a story! No contribution is too small and we love having new folks around.

If you're more artistically inclined give a drawing or sketch a shot. Don't fret too much; it doesn't have to be fancy and we appreciate artwork a lot.

If that isn't your style either, writers always need feedback. So tell us what you liked - and what you didn't - to help us improve.

If you are unsure about anything, do not be afraid to ask. We will gladly bring you up-to-date or explain anything you feel is unclear.

threads.com:
This will be deleted so it'll be quick. Today's an exceptionally special day as it marks 10 years since Milky Way's Tumblr started. The tumblr is now age-restricted but you can view the posts here starting from the back: https://www.tumbex.com/milkmare-of-trottingham.tumblr/posts?page=10

Milky's special talent quickly gained the blog over 1400 watchers in less than two weeks. It was especially embraced on /mlp/ where the thread generated several times more content than the tumblr which was only in its second day: https://desuarchive.org/mlp/thread/5678650/#q5678650 Milky had a continuous presence for months afterwards as a general thread.

Fast forward to May 2013 and it was on its 71st general thread: https://desuarchive.org/mlp/thread/10866090/#q10866090 The thread was deleted early and the incident shrugged off, but unbeknownst to them it was right before some of the most eventful days in /mlp/ history. Lauren Faust would visit /mlp/ a few days later https://desuarchive.org/mlp/chunk/10902082/ and all hell broke loose, even prompting a reply from Moot (https://desuarchive.org/mlp/chunk/10902082/500/3/#q10906860). But attention quickly turned to "The Scruffening", a mass deletion of various threads and general confusion over the following days. Milky Way threads were quickly deleted from then on, later confirmed as bannable content due to its NSFW nature: https://desuarchive.org/q/thread/640332/#q641855 Some claimed that Lauren's visit sparked the sudden SFW enforcement but this remains inconclusive.

Milky Way threads have occasionally been posted over the years, lasting only a few minutes to several hours at a time. While the blog's creator remains active (https://twitter.com/FlashEquestria), the blog itself hasn't had a new post in a year.

Not expecting a discussion here. This one's for the archives.

>knives and swords in melee

Anon...
Medieval armor stopped being used not because it's not protective, but because it's fucking heavy. A full suit is 30kg, and you need to carry the weapons and supplies too (modern soldier gear, including gun, ammo for it, and said supplies, is also in the vicinity of 30kg). And it's better to have 4mm over torso only than 1.5-2mm all over the body because bullet hits on stomach, arms and legs are not anywhere near as dangerous FYI bullet hits on inner thigh and armpit are still lethal because not only there's high pressure veins there, those fucking things are UNDER TENSION and will slip inside the body if torn apart. Imagine trying to grab and squeeze a pressurized lube hose that you can't see. Yeah. as sword slashes on the same - that's why armor first lost everything but the cuirass, then became modern plate carriers.
>>39342597
Yeah, kevlar does jack and shit against anything sharp or stabby, even against bullets it's only good against blunt-tipped ones because pointy ones just spread the fibers and go through (but most pistol bullets are blunt-tipped so it's fine). To protect against knives, you need rigid plates, a.k.a. exact same steel and ceramic that are used against bullets, just with more overlap.

>>39343658
>"You...you'll do that for me?"
"Of course, Anon!"
>Seeing him finally smile again fills your heart with bliss. A faint hope still lingers in him. He is not surrendering just yet.
"And it would be nice to take a break from this routine, right?"
>"Yeah, this could work. I'll get us tickets as soon as I can."
"That's my man."
>Right now you're both smiling at each other and all is good. If there is a moment you wish for him to not forget, it's this.
>This is the moment.
>You need to say it right now.
"I can't even imagine how you feel about all this."
>And?
"But I just want you to know that..."
>Go on.
>Even if you're blushing, even if your heart can't take it.
"No matter what happens, I-"
>...
>Your mouth hangs open and you feel as if you're silently gasping for air.
>The painful seconds you are given to stall your confession end with Anon's hand touching your mane and patting it lightly.
>"I know," he says, trying to ease the tension. "You'll be there for me, won't you?"
>Trying to hide the tears that are forming in the corner of your eyes, you shut them close and smile, nodding in agreement.
>While you're fighting yourself and mentally kicking your stupid brain for freezing up for so long, you are apparently picked up by the human and are now travelling onto his lap.
>Once you're there the eyes you were trying to keep shut open to face Anon...only to close the moment after, but not out of frustration.
>His hand is embracing your back while the other cups your cheek, making sure to align your muzzle with his face to touch your lips with his.
>This is how you wanted it. Even though his kiss is reserved and lacks the vulgar sloppiness you forced on him the first time you did it, it feels a lot better now that you both are into it, not just you.
>Your lips touch again and again and you find it easy to lean on him and relax as his hand traces your neck, smoothly running through your mane.
>When you finally break it off, all you can do is just look him in the eyes with your mouth still half-open, still longing for more. In the end, you're still a coward.
>The magic didn't happen. Something is keeping your heart sealed. Your dumb head is afraid of some dumb words.
>But you were so close. You'll get it right soon. You have to.
>Even if it takes you hours to get out of yourself then so be it. You'll restrain Anon again and you're gonna keep kissing him until you can't take it anymore and just say it.
>You just want it to be...special, yeah. Not like a comfort thing. Ponies will say anything just to reassure another in a dire situation, right? So you don't want to be misunderstood.
>Yes, that's it. You need a different mood. It's all these circumstances again.
>...
>You are so lame.

last_replies.name: A Wish Enough for Two
last_replies.com:
>>39343664
>Getting tickets to a Saturday train posed no problem. Now that Anon has this promise of clarity dingling in front of him the mood you're both in improves quite a bit.
>Not only that, your human seems to be getting a bit more open with displays of affection after your first (consensual) kiss.
>You're just going to forget that other one ever happened. Seems like it was forever ago.
>Looking at the calendar you clearly see it's been just a month. If only you had memories enough for it.
>The stress you've been through made you accept the faults in this reality. The shadows, the flow of time, who cares at this point. You have Anon.
>You can't fight the whole world. You can't even understand it. Anon's theories made no sense to you and if he can't get it, then you're not even going to try.
>If there's a fundamental flaw in it you just have to make the best of your time here together. You don't know if Anon agrees with you but it doesn't feel like he can do anything about it even if he wanted.
>You can't imagine him complaining about having your support in his adventure, that's for certain. It's something you think you've bonded over already.
>And so the days before the expeditions are spent preparing for it, mostly mentally. Especially when you’re out in the depths of the busy city.
"What do you think we'll find there?"
>Your magic carefully picks up a massive slice of pizza and you concentrate on it for a moment, not ready to hear Anon's reply yet. Thankfully, he's equally as busy with his slice.
>These human establishments that keep popping up all across Manehattan have left you with weekend outings plans for months ahead.
>Most of them owe Anon in some way or another. From an errand boy to being one of the oldest consultants at the embassy, your human has risen to the top and is widely esteemed as the unifying force between human and pony businesses.
>And for you it means lots of dates involving exotic food. Even human pizza tastes different from what you're used to.
>You wonder if that's meat you're tasting, humans eat that all the time, right? Those red discs sure are juicy and spicy.
>Chewing his portion, Anon shrugs.
>"Something that doesn't fit into our theory about lack of strong magic here. Transporting people from our world is probably a massive undertaking. Unless Cadance is helping but has personally erased every mention of herself everywhere, which is..."
>Anon laughs bitterly at a supposedly preposterous thought like that.
"I still don't understand, if the princesses you told me about were ponies who commanded such general ideas like love and friendship, wouldn't it make everypony simply rely on them to deal with all the problems?"
>Anon shakes his head, taking another slice.
>"Basically, yeah, but it's not that easy. They mostly help others by guiding them to realizing the solution to their problems on their own."
"Hmmm..."
>You know one thing, you could surely use some advice from the authority on all love-related things.

last_replies.name: A Wish Enough for Two
last_replies.com:
>>39343668
>She'd tell you exactly what to do. "Yes, Moonluck, to deal with this you just have to blah blah blah". And your struggles and doubts are all gone.
>Part of you admits that this reminds you of what those shadows have been doing, as cryptic as their musings might've been. But it's hard to deny that it'd be easier to trust those wisdoms if a friendly looking pony was giving them to you, not scary unnatural phenomena.
>"I wonder how different things would've been if this was just normal Equestria..."
>For a moment you think about this too. Just a normal life without any interruptions.
>Just like you had before the circumstances started messing with your ability to express yourself. Although, now that you think about it, these same circumstances forced you to make drastic moves you'd never bring yourself to make otherwise.
>It might've been a catalyst to you being this close to Anon now. After all, it's hardships that make you stick close to each other.
>Not your words, naturally, but if this wisdom and all others weren't yours now through those whispers, what chance you would've had to realize such important things on your own?
>You'd probably still struggled to even hug your man...
>"Well, hopefully we'll find out once we see how things really are. Last human who got here like a week ago said there's nothing unusual going on in the HQ, but we'll see."
>Anon nods to himself, assured that his hope isn't for nothing.
"You really think we can fix whatever is wrong with this place?"
>Your cautious question gets a confident reply:
>"Maybe not fix, but something surely can be done. I'll be fine with just shadows disappearing forever. Or maybe we can even get into the proper timeline, who knows?"
>So many opportunities, it almost makes Anon too excited. He's eating with gusto, probably imagining how he'll personally punch the villain responsible for this in the muzzle once he figures it all out.
>What about you then? Surely you'll follow him into whatever other "timeline" he discovers.
>Not a lot of things that keep you here. No real friends, family is fairly distant, the job is peaceful but not exciting at all.
>The realization makes you chew a bit slower. Nothing really keeps you here other than Anon.
>What WAS your life before you met him then?
>You can't really recall. Going to work, coming back, sleeping on repeat? This is dangerously similar to Anon's description of his memories.
>Either you are becoming affected by his memory fog or you were always just this bore of a mare.
>Nothing was going wrong but nothing was going right.
>You had a whole lot of nothing and nothing was going on before you met Anon. Maybe that's why you got matched to him, so you wake up from your eternal daydream for once and face reality.
>And now it turns you this reality isn't even the right one. What if you were right to daydream all this time?
"You sure it's possible to do this?"
>"Not really, but what choice do I have?"

>>39343671
>Anon looks at your with a bit of pity in his eyes and adds:
>"You're worried about what's going to happen to everything here, aren't you?"
"I guess," you lower your gaze. "But.. I'd rather follow you."
>If his presence is the only reason you even remember these days then you simply can't afford to lose him, lose sight of him even for a short time.
>"Thanks, Moonluck. This means a lot to me."
>When your eyes meet again you feel he means it. You are his anchor here just as well.
>How did it all come to this? You're both lost without one another.
>So if it were up to you, what would you choose, leaving everything as is or changing everything but with a chance of being separated from Anon?
>No, it is definitely too early to think about this.
>But what would Anon choose?
>Stop that!
>He hasn't made any advances on you despite you being closer than ever. You know you're a stupid and awkward mare but he's not like you at all, surely he'd find it in himself to confess to you - if he has feelings for you that is.
>What if...
>To clear your head of such thoughts you stuff your face with what remains of your part of the pizza, to Anon's amusement.
>You're too close to finding something that's gonna change your life to start doubting everything you've come to rely on in it now!
>"Guess that's a good enough rating for this place?" the man laughs and reaches your muzzle to pick some stray bit of food off of it.
>Which you immediately snatch right out of his fingers with your magic, embarrassed by him laughing even more as he watches you do that.
>Your blush remains all the way until you pay for your food and thank the owner, a tall looking guy with a twirly mustache who expresses his gratitude to Anon with an unfamiliar accent.
>However, the weather outside cools you down immediately. Even this lively part of the city is still freezing over despite all the movement disturbing the air around you.
>It feels especially crowded tonight. You make sure to not let Anon out of sight as you return home.
>There were times when you wished your man was more proactive than you, but you're not too dumb to not get that he might just be matching your non-existent pace.
>So in order to get cuddled tonight you'll have to initiate it. You hurry home just to bring that moment closer.
>By the time Anon is done with his own preparations for the night, you finish packing two modest bags for tomorrow, one for yourself and one for him.
>After having such horrible doubts at the restaurant you simply have to make sure he's still reciprocating your affection, however timid it is.
>It doesn't take much for you to confirm it. You are embraced as soon as you turn to face him when you both get under the sheets.
"Mh-mm..."
>You know Anon is smiling at you unconsciously vocalizing your satisfaction and it makes you smile too. A gentle hand brings your head to your man's neck and your full frontal hug is now complete.
>"Tomorrow..." he whispers. "It'll all be over tomorrow."

Welcome to the Pony Voice Preservation Project!
youtu.be/730zGRwbQuE

The Pony Preservation Project is a collaborative effort by /mlp/ to build and curate pony datasets for as many applications in AI as possible.

Technology has progressed such that a trained neural network can generate convincing voice clips, drawings and text for any person or character using existing audio recordings, artwork and fanfics as a reference. As you can surely imagine, AI pony voices, drawings and text have endless applications for pony content creation.

AI is incredibly versatile, basically anything that can be boiled down to a simple dataset can be used for training to create more of it. AI-generated images, fanfics, wAIfu chatbots and even animation are possible, and are being worked on here.

Any anon is free to join, and there are many active tasks that would suit any level of technical expertise. If you’re interested in helping out, take a look at the quick start guide linked below and ask in the thread for any further detail you need.

EQG and G5 are not welcome.

threads.sub: Rainbow Dash is Too Much of a Tomboy
threads.com:
The idea that Sunset and Applejack are as masculine as Rainbow Dash is laughable. They are much more mellow and have much more feminine traits so that their friendships with the others still feels natural, they doesn't come off as the token tomboy like Rainbow Dash does.

Rainbow Dash has the personality of a typical loud male jock and yet she is friends with feminine girls who have completely different temperaments and interests than her. She has never been shown with tomboy or male friends that have her type of temperament. She comes off as a forced token tomboy character. Like really, they couldn't give her a single male friend? She has the masculine temperament of guys, so it seems like she would have definitely have male friends. Heck, she acts a lot more like your average male than your average female.

Where are her friends that are not vastly different from her? I'm not even necessarily asking for the same interests, just for a similar temperment. The rest of them are all chill normies in spite of varying interests while Rainbow is just alone as the loud brash hyper dude bro. And yet she magically is on the same footing as the rest as best friends, and appears to have no other close friends. If you had a jock friend who acted like Rainbow Dash but is a male, would you be able to see them as best friends with people with the mane six's temperment? Of course not.

In a real life setting like high school or college, what group of people could you more naturally see Rainbow Dash hanging out and bonding with: A group of brash, mascaline troublemakers (whether male or tomboys) who are athletic and enjoy screwing around, or the feminine safe mane six? You know the answer to this question deep down in spite of all the mental gymnastics you use to deny it. The Mane Six are too attitudinally safe and unfun for her. Her placement in the show is forced and has always been forced. But people don't care because they like tomboys. Which is fair enough, but you still gotta acknowledge this blatant flaw even if it does not personally bother you.

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
Part of why MAS series is so good in my opinion is the capture of what made mlp so fun in the early days, the speculation and world building.

Back when Celestia seemed this omnipotent and omnipresent physical god that ruled over the ponies, who, in turn, ruled over so much of nature but still lived in a grand mysterious world. It was this mythology that made mlp fun. The mystery around the world and the fun character interactions that would arise. Celestia and Luna's conflict being the one great mythological moment that articulated the lore.

What MAS did was turn those character dynamics into much more nuanced interactions . Twilight is this abused groomed unicorn being set up to get a role in leadership. Celestia is a mysterious looming tyrant, Luna is an unhinged powerful maniac. etc. The Star in Yellow original fanfic has this incredible idea of presenting their story from the point of view of one of the main players while hiding this fact and so, hiding the mystey in plain sight. There are so many incredible elements at play, the occult, how much different of a being Celestia is from the rest of the ponies that her childhood diary is one of the most powerful magical items in the world, her stranged relationship with her family, Twilight getting a new point of view on a figure of authority she has feared for so much of her life. There is also the great metacommentary about the disillusionment of fiction and how mlp as a series lost steam over its run time as the once fantastical elements were replaced by familiar set pieces. As the world got bigger, it got so much more smaller.

I know I am rambling at this point but it makes me really sad how the last RDP got so little views on comparison to the others and it is not talked about as much despite having incredible animation and the greatest story told relating mlp.
